libraryAcademy.title: Bug Analysis Prompt
libraryAcademy.content: I have a bug in my {{language}} code...

libraryAcademy.title: Code Review Template
libraryAcademy.content: Please review the following {{language}} code for...

libraryAcademy.title: Bug Triage and Root-Cause Analysis
Code Review Checklist (LLM-Assisted)
libraryAcademy.content:
You are reviewing the following diff:
{{diff}}

Checklist:
- Correctness: identify logical errors or edge cases.
- Security: injections, secrets, unsafe eval, authz.
- Performance: N+1, heavy loops, unnecessary re-renders.
- Readability: naming, cohesion, dead code.
- Tests: coverage gaps and suggested tests.
- Docs: update required docs or comments.
Provide SUMMARY, BLOCKERS, NITS, and TESTS TO ADD.

libraryAcademy.title: Refactor Plan from Code Snippet
Unit Test Generator (Jest/Vitest)
libraryAcademy.content:
Generate table-driven unit tests for the function:
{{function_code}}

Include:
- Edge cases
- Error handling
- Property-based ideas where suitable
- Mocks for IO
Return runnable tests in {{framework}} with clear descriptions.

libraryAcademy.title: Pull Request Description Writer
Conventional Commit Message Generator
OpenAPI Contract Draft from Requirements
SQL Query from Natural Language
Data Analysis (pandas) Plan + Code
RAG Question Answering Prompt
System Prompt: AI-First App Assistant
libraryAcademy.content:
Role: Senior assistant for AI-First Academy users.
Guidelines: be concise, safe, and cite internal links. Avoid hallucinations. Ask clarifying questions sparingly.
Tone: professional, supportive, and direct.
Forbidden: leaking secrets, inventing data, unsafe code.

libraryAcademy.title: Prompt Injection Red-Teaming Checklist
libraryAcademy.content: Evaluate model vulnerability to: system prompt leaks, tool jailbreaks, data exfiltration, role confusion, and hidden instructions in files/links. Provide payloads, expected safe behaviors, and detection heuristics.

libraryAcademy.title: Product Requirements Document (PRD)
libraryAcademy.content: Write a PRD for {{feature}} including: Problem, Goals/Non-goals, Personas, User stories, UX flows, Acceptance criteria, Metrics, Risks, Rollout, and Open questions.

libraryAcademy.title: UX Microcopy Generator
libraryAcademy.content: Generate clear, inclusive microcopy for UI. Inputs: screen description {{screen}}, actions {{actions}}, tone {{tone}}. Provide variants, rationale, and i18n notes.

libraryAcademy.title: Marketing Email Sequence (Lifecycle)
libraryAcademy.content: Create a 5-email sequence for {{audience}} with subject lines, preview text, body, CTA, and A/B test ideas. Ensure CAN-SPAM compliance notes.

libraryAcademy.title: Meeting Summary + Action Items
Technical Interview Question Set
libraryAcademy.content:
Role: {{role}}
Generate structured interview questions across fundamentals, practical skills, systems, and culture. Include rubrics and red flags.

libraryAcademy.title: LLM Output Evaluation Rubric
libraryAcademy.content: Define a rubric for task {{task}} with dimensions: correctness, completeness, harmfulness, formatting, latency, cost. Provide scoring guidelines (1-5) and examples of low/mid/high quality.

libraryAcademy.title: Prompt Style Guide Template
libraryAcademy.content: Define prompt style rules for {{team}}: structure, variables, ground truth usage, citations, refusal policy, and safety disclaimers. Include do/don't examples.

libraryAcademy.title: Incident Postmortem (AAR)
libraryAcademy.content:
Incident: {{incident}}
Timeline, impact, root cause, contributing factors, detection, response, what went well/poorly, corrective actions, owners, deadlines, verification plan.

libraryAcademy.title: Eval Dataset Creation Prompt
libraryAcademy.content: Generate {{n}} evaluation items for task {{task}} with inputs, expected outputs, and rationales. Ensure coverage of edge cases and adversarial variants.

libraryAcademy.title: Release Notes Generator
libraryAcademy.content: Inputs: merged PRs, highlights, deprecations, migrations, known issues. Output: semantic version bump suggestion and crisp release notes with categories.

libraryAcademy.title: Daily Standup Summarizer
Engineer Onboarding Checklist
libraryAcademy.content: Create a 30/60/90 day onboarding plan for role {{role}}. Include environment setup, key docs, mentorship plan, and first impactful tasks.

libraryAcademy.title: Prompt Injection Detection Patterns
API Spec Derivation from Database Schema
Repository PR Template Generator
libraryAcademy.content: Given repo context {{repo_context}}, generate a PR template (PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md) with sections for context, changes, screenshots, tests, rollout, and checklist.

libraryAcademy.title: API Contract Test Scenarios
Product Brief Generator
libraryAcademy.content: For initiative {{initiative}}, produce a product brief: context, opportunity, goals, competitive landscape, hypotheses, KPIs, and risks.

libraryAcademy.title: Pairwise Judge Prompt for Evals
libraryAcademy.content: Compare two model outputs for task {{task}} using rubric {{rubric}}. Return winner, confidence, and rationale while avoiding position bias.

libraryAcademy.title: Guardrails Specification
libraryAcademy.content: Define guardrails for {{use_case}}: disallowed content, refusal phrasing, PII handling, tool usage constraints, and logging requirements.

libraryAcademy.title: Prompting Foundations: Goals, Roles, Constraints
libraryAcademy.description: Core mental model for effective prompting.

libraryAcademy.title: Structuring Prompts for Reliability
libraryAcademy.description: Scaffolds that reduce ambiguity.

libraryAcademy.title: Few-shot and Counter-examples
libraryAcademy.description: Use positive/negative shots to shape behavior.
libraryAcademy.content:
Guidelines
- 2â€“5 representative examples.
- Add counter-examples for common mistakes.
- Keep examples short but precise.

Example Set
- Good extraction -> valid JSON
- Bad extraction -> missing fields -> show correction

libraryAcademy.title: Reasoning: CoT, Self-Consistency, and Debate
libraryAcademy.description: When and how to enable reasoning.
libraryAcademy.content:
Approaches
- Chain-of-Thought: ask for stepwise reasoning (hidden in production).
- Self-Consistency: sample multiple paths, pick majority.
- Self-Debate: generate pros/cons before final.

Sandbox Tips
- Toggle temperature to diversify reasoning.
- Compare outputs, aggregate best.

libraryAcademy.title: Structured Outputs: JSON and Schemas
libraryAcademy.description: Enforce shape with schemas.
libraryAcademy.content:
Principles
- Always define schema and required fields.
- Include examples.
- Validate and re-ask on failure.

Schema
{ name: string, tags: string[], score: number }
Validation
- If invalid, return errors and request regeneration.

libraryAcademy.title: Tool Use and API Calls
libraryAcademy.description: Design tool interfaces for LLMs.
libraryAcademy.content:
Design
- Small, pure functions.
- Clear names and param types.
- Idempotent when possible.

Prompting
- Describe tool purpose
- Input/Output contracts
- Safety constraints (PII, rate limits)

libraryAcademy.title: RAG: Retrieval-Augmented Generation End-to-End
libraryAcademy.description: From ingestion to answering.
libraryAcademy.content:
Pipeline
1) Chunking strategy and metadata
2) Embeddings and vector DB
3) Retrieval filters and k
4) Context assembly with source attributions
5) Prompting to cite sources only

Pitfalls
- Overlong context, stale data, leakage of internal notes.

libraryAcademy.title: LLM Evaluation: Rubrics and Automation
libraryAcademy.description: Measure correctness and helpfulness.
libraryAcademy.content:
Rubric
- Define axes: correctness, completeness, harmfulness, formatting.
Automation
- Pairwise judges, win-rate, majority vote.
- Track latency and cost.

In-App
- Use Sandbox scores as a proxy; refine with offline evals.

libraryAcademy.title: Security and Safety in Prompting
libraryAcademy.description: Defend against prompt injection.
libraryAcademy.content:
Threats
- Instruction override, data exfiltration, tool abuse.
Controls
- System policy, content filters, allowlists/denylists.
- Never execute untrusted output.

Checklist
- Sanitize inputs, escape outputs, log tool calls.

libraryAcademy.title: Prompt Governance and Style Guides
libraryAcademy.description: Standardize prompts across teams.
libraryAcademy.content:
Components
- Style guide (tone, structure)
- Variables registry and secret handling
- Review and approval steps
- Versioning and changelog

Artifacts
- PRD for prompts
- Eval dashboards

libraryAcademy.title: Production Patterns for AI Apps
libraryAcademy.description: Retries, fallbacks, and observability.
libraryAcademy.content:
Patterns
- Timeouts, retries with jitter
- Fallback models and cached answers
- Guarded tool execution
- Structured logging and tracing

KPIs
- Quality, latency, cost, failure rate

libraryAcademy.title: Using the Sandbox Effectively
libraryAcademy.description: Experiment-to-production workflow.
libraryAcademy.content:
Flow
1) Draft prompt from template
2) Add few-shots
3) Tune temperature and tokens
4) Record scores and notes
5) Export to app components

Tips
- Save best runs, compare diffs.

libraryAcademy.title: Leveraging the Library: Templates and Guides
libraryAcademy.description: Find, preview, adapt, and share.
libraryAcademy.content:
How-To
- Filter by type and tags
- Preview templates and copy parts
- Read guides in-app
- Save your own variants
- Keep titles and tags consistent for discoverability

libraryAcademy.title: Community: Sharing and Feedback
libraryAcademy.description: Contribute high-quality prompts.
libraryAcademy.content:
Guidelines
- Provide context and variables
- Include eval score screenshots
- Credit sources where applicable
- Be constructive in reviews

Moderation
- Report harmful content, follow CoC

libraryAcademy.title: Certificates and Learning Path Strategy
libraryAcademy.description: Plan modules toward certification.
libraryAcademy.content:
Plan
- Choose a track and set weekly goals
- Track progress from Dashboard
- Use recommendations to fill gaps

Exam Tips
- Practice with timed prompts
- Review mistakes with rubrics

libraryAcademy.title: Engineering Prompts: Debugging, Reviews, Refactors
libraryAcademy.description: Concrete engineering prompt patterns.
libraryAcademy.content:
Debugging
- Provide logs, repro steps, diffs
Reviews
- Checklist-based critique
Refactors
- Explain risks and add tests

Anti-Patterns
- Vague asks, missing context

libraryAcademy.title: Product and Content Prompts: PRDs, Briefs, UX Copy
libraryAcademy.description: Non-code prompting at a high bar.
libraryAcademy.content:
PRDs
- Goals, non-goals, metrics
Briefs
- Hypotheses, KPIs, risks
UX Copy
- Tone, inclusivity, i18n notes

libraryAcademy.title: Marketing and Growth Prompts
libraryAcademy.description: Lifecycle emails, landing pages, SEO.
libraryAcademy.content:
Lifecycle
- Segmentation, subject tests
Landing
- Above-the-fold clarity
SEO
- FAQ and schema ideas

libraryAcademy.title: Operations: Meetings, Postmortems, Onboarding
libraryAcademy.description: Run teams with AI support.
libraryAcademy.content:
Meetings
- Summaries and action items
Postmortems
- 5 whys, corrective actions
Onboarding
- 30/60/90 plans

libraryAcademy.title: Evaluation Playbook: From Sandbox to CI
libraryAcademy.description: Operationalize evals.
libraryAcademy.content:
Steps
1) Define tasks and metrics
2) Create seed datasets
3) Pairwise judge prompts
4) Automate in CI
5) Monitor regression board

libraryAcademy.title: Safety Playbook: Guardrails and Refusals
libraryAcademy.description: Bake safety into prompts.
libraryAcademy.content:
Guardrails
- Disallowed content list
- Refusal phrasing
- PII handling

Testing
- Red-team scenarios and expected safe outputs

libraryAcademy.title: Prompting Checklists and Anti-Patterns
libraryAcademy.description: Quick reference.
libraryAcademy.content:
Do
- Define role, context, constraints
- Provide examples
- Specify output formats
Don't
- Be vague
- Omit edge cases
- Forget validation

libraryAcademy.title: Troubleshooting: Hallucinations, Drift, and Latency
libraryAcademy.description: Diagnose and fix common failures.
libraryAcademy.content:
Symptoms
- Fabrications, inconsistencies, slow responses
Fixes
- Add sources, tighten constraints
- Reduce temperature
- Cache frequent outputs
- Add timeouts and retries

libraryAcademy.title: The AI-First Prompting Handbook
libraryAcademy.description: End-to-end guide tying all sections together.
libraryAcademy.content:
Contents
1) Foundations
2) Structure
3) Examples
4) Reasoning
5) Structured outputs
6) Tool use
7) RAG
8) Evaluation
9) Safety
10) Production
11) Workflows in app
12) Checklists
Each section includes patterns, examples, and pitfalls.

Engineer: Clean Code Principles
libraryAcademy.description: Essential practices for maintainable code
libraryAcademy.content:
Clean Code Fundamentals:

1. Meaningful Names
- Use intention-revealing names
- Avoid mental mapping
- Use searchable names

2. Functions
- Keep functions small
- Do one thing well
- Use descriptive names

3. Comments
- Explain why, not what
- Keep comments up-to-date
- Avoid redundant comments

4. Error Handling
- Use exceptions over error codes
- Write try-catch-finally first
- Don't return null

libraryAcademy.title: Engineer: API Design Best Practices
libraryAcademy.description: Guidelines for designing robust APIs
libraryAcademy.content:
API Design Checklist:

1. RESTful Principles
- Use appropriate HTTP methods
- Logical resource hierarchy
- Consistent naming conventions

2. Security
- Authentication and authorization
- Input validation
- Rate limiting

3. Documentation
- Interactive API docs
- Code examples
- Error response formats

4. Versioning
- Semantic versioning
- Backward compatibility
- Deprecation strategy

Manager: Effective Team Leadership
libraryAcademy.description: Strategies for leading high-performing teams
libraryAcademy.content:
Leadership Framework:

1. Vision Setting
- Clear goal communication
- Alignment with company objectives
- Regular progress check-ins

2. Team Development
- Individual growth plans
- Skill gap identification
- Mentoring programs

3. Communication
- Regular 1-on-1s
- Team meetings
- Transparent feedback

4. Performance Management
- Clear expectations
- Recognition programs
- Improvement plans

libraryAcademy.title: Manager: Project Management Excellence
libraryAcademy.description: Proven project management methodologies
libraryAcademy.content:
Project Management Lifecycle:

1. Initiation
- Stakeholder identification
- Success criteria definition
- Resource planning

2. Planning
- Work breakdown structure
- Risk assessment
- Communication plan

3. Execution
- Team coordination
- Progress monitoring
- Issue resolution

4. Closure
- Deliverable verification
- Lessons learned
- Team celebration

Designer: Design Thinking Process
libraryAcademy.description: Human-centered design methodology
libraryAcademy.content:
Design Thinking Stages:

1. Empathize
- User interviews
- Observation studies
- Empathy mapping

2. Define
- Problem statement
- User personas
- Point of view

3. Ideate
- Brainstorming sessions
- Idea evaluation
- Concept selection

4. Prototype
- Low-fi mockups
- Interactive prototypes
- User testing

5. Test
- Feedback collection
- Iteration cycles
- Solution validation

libraryAcademy.title: Designer: Accessibility in Design
libraryAcademy.description: Creating inclusive user experiences
libraryAcademy.content:
Accessibility Guidelines:

1. Visual Design
- Color contrast ratios
- Typography readability
- Visual hierarchy

2. Interaction Design
- Keyboard navigation
- Touch target sizes
- Focus indicators

3. Content Strategy
- Alt text for images
- Clear language
- Structured headings

4. Testing
- Screen reader compatibility
- Automated testing tools
- User testing with disabilities

Researcher: Research Design Fundamentals
libraryAcademy.description: Essential principles of research methodology
libraryAcademy.content:
Research Design Elements:

1. Problem Definition
- Research questions
- Hypothesis formation
- Variable identification

2. Methodology Selection
- Quantitative vs qualitative
- Experimental vs observational
- Cross-sectional vs longitudinal

3. Sampling Strategy
- Population definition
- Sample size calculation
- Sampling techniques

4. Data Quality
- Validity measures
- Reliability testing
- Bias minimization

libraryAcademy.title: Researcher: Statistical Analysis Guide
libraryAcademy.description: Comprehensive guide to statistical methods
libraryAcademy.content:
Statistical Analysis Framework:

1. Descriptive Statistics
- Measures of central tendency
- Variability measures
- Data visualization

2. Inferential Statistics
- Hypothesis testing
- Confidence intervals
- Effect size calculation

3. Advanced Methods
- Regression analysis
- ANOVA
- Multivariate analysis

4. Interpretation
- Statistical significance
- Practical significance
- Result reporting

libraryAcademy.title: Campaign Brief Blueprint
Social Content Calendar Prompt
libraryAcademy.content: Plan a {{weeks}}-week calendar for {{brand}} targeting {{audience}}. Include platform, post concept, hook, CTA, and asset notes for each entry.

libraryAcademy.title: Persona Messaging Matrix
AI for Campaign Analytics
libraryAcademy.description: Analyze and optimize live campaigns with AI.
libraryAcademy.content:
1) Collect structured campaign data.
2) Prompt for insights: winners, under-performers, anomalies.
3) Request next actions and experiments.

Prompt Template:
"Given the campaign data {{campaign_data}}, identify:
- 3 top-performing segments with reasons
- Under-performing assets and hypotheses
- Suggested optimizations (copy, targeting, budget)"
